original_text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant, whom his lord hath made ruler over his household, to give them meat in due season?
korean_text: 충성되고 지혜 있는 종이 되어 주인에게 그 집 사람들을 맡아 때를 따라 양식을 나눠 줄 자가 누구냐

sentences.original_text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 누가 충성되고 지혜 있는 종이겠느냐

sentences.original_text: whom his lord hath made ruler
to give them meat in due season?
sentences.korean_translation: 정한 때에 그들에게 양식을 주는 자?
